hooks.command: file_path=$(jq -r '.tool_input.file_path') && if [[ "$file_path" == *.go ]]; then gofmt -w "$file_path" && backend_root=$(echo "$file_path" | grep -oE '.*/apps/backend') && if [ -n "$backend_root" ]; then cd "$backend_root" && pkg_dir="./$(dirname "${file_path#$backend_root/}")" && go vet "$pkg_dir" 2>&1; fi; fi

file_path=$(jq -r '.tool_input.file_path') && if [[ "$file_path" =~ \.(ts|tsx|js|jsx)$ ]]; then frontend_root=$(echo "$file_path" | grep -oE '.*/apps/frontend') && if [ -n "$frontend_root" ]; then cd "$frontend_root" && npx eslint --fix "$file_path" 2>&1; fi; fi
